scripts.build-with-dashboard: npm run integrate-dashboard && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build-with-dashboard && aws s3 sync build/ s3://decoded-genai-stack-webappne-websitebucket4326d7c2-jvplfkkey9mb --delete --region eu-central-1
scripts.deploy-complete: npm run fix-dashboard && npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://decoded-genai-stack-webappne-websitebucket4326d7c2-jvplfkkey9mb --delete --region eu-central-1
scripts.health-check: echo 'Check http://localhost:3000/health.json after running npm start'
scripts.test-apis: echo 'Open http://localhost:3000/api-test.html after running npm start'
